[http://www.rpn9.com|www.rpn9.com] }} '''DYKC-TV''', channel 9, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[Radio Philippines Network]]. Its studios are located at RPN Compound, Maguikay, [[Mandaue City]]. == RPN Cebu History == * 1965 - Pre-merger ABS opened another station in Cebu, Channel 9 after the opening of rival station, DYSS-TV. * 1966 - Channels 3 & 9 broadcasts in color television. * 1972 - Channels 3 & 9 shuts down under martial law of Ferdinand Marcos and Channel 9 sold to Kanlaon Broadcasting System. ==Local programs== ===News and Current Affairs programs=== * NewsWatch Central Visayas ===Religious programs=== * [[Ang Dating Daan]] ==Defunct programs== ===News and Current Affairs programs=== * [[NewsWatch (Philippine TV program)|NewsWatch Cebu]] ==Past personalities== * [[Jolene Bulambot]] * [[Janice CaliÃ±o]] * [[Gloria CaÃ±ete]] * [[Chona Carreon]] * [[Ahmed Cuizon]] * [[Marnee Gacellos]] * [[Leo Lastimosa]] * [[Rico Lucena]] * [[Dante Luzon]] * [[Bob Malazarte]] * [[Rey Martinez]] * [[Jongkoy Monceda]] * [[Bobby Nalzaro]] * [[Fides Palicte]] * [[Oscar Pasaporte]] * [[Lou-Anne Mae Rondina]] * [[Jun Tariman]] ==See also== *[[Radio Philippines Network]] {{Metro Cebu TV}} {{RPN Visayas}} {{Philippines-tv-stub}} [[Category:RPN stations]] [[Category:Television in Cebu City]] [[Category:Television stations in the Philippines]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 1969]] [[ceb:DYKC-TV]]
